feed.title: OliveTin Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.04.212
entry.content:
Changelog

Bug fixes

  • ca72816 bugfix: Start filewatcher on different goroutines

Others

  • 8f1dfff fmt: Clean up log statement

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.04.212

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2024.04.212

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

Useful links

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.04.26
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 12cf001 feature: extra args for fileindir (#291)

Bug fixes

  • 5057ba2 bugfix: Start filewatcher on different goroutines (#286)
  • dfca712 bugfix: Update icon on buttons (#288)

Others

  • a3aee36 More screenshots link (#289)
  • 7c6f36c doc: Update images
  • 8f1dfff fmt: Clean up log statement

Container images (from GitHub)

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.04.28
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • a783fc8 feature: Arguments are now also passed as ENV variables (#296)
  • d6cb634 feature: Extra file info using onfileindir (#293)
  • dc6f6c2 feature: Kill support in the UI (#297)
  • 8fd9887 feature: Save logs! #174 (#300)

Bug fixes

  • ceb215a bugfix: #272 if the dialog is already open, close it (#294)

Others

  • f467c69 Argument suggestions (#301)
  • 6a16a7c fmt: onfileindir (#295)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.04.28

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2024.04.28

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

Useful links

  • Which download do I need?
  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!

entry.title: New release for OliveTin: 2024.05.13
entry.content:
Changelog

Features

  • 1ab35fd feature: #Logs and similar in the address bar to load relevant section (#306) (#310)
  • f43ece4 feature: Better sosreports (#308)

Bug fixes

  • 80083fe bugfix: Race condition in stringvariables (#311)

Others

  • 9d33e62 Merge branch 'main' of ssh://github.com/OliveTin/OliveTin
  • c24adaa Merge branch 'main' of ssh://github.com/OliveTin/OliveTin
  • 7e34efd chore: remove refs to deprecated io/ioutil (#309)
  • 638e5b7 doc: fix default licenses in package.json (#304)
  • ea1ce82 fmt: Change publicid map debug URL
  • 8625e1f fmt: Clean REST API Testing (#307)

Container images (from GitHub)

  • docker pull ghcr.io/olivetin/olivetin:2024.05.13

Container images (on Docker Hub)

  • docker pull docker.io/jamesread/olivetin:2024.05.13

Upgrade warnings, or breaking changes

  • No such issues between the last release and this version.

  • Ask for help and chat with others users in the Discord community

Thanks for your interest in OliveTin!
